00071 class ChromosomeCMACholesky : public ChromosomeT< double >
00072 {
00073 public:
00074   ChromosomeCMACholesky( ) {}
00075   explicit ChromosomeCMACholesky( unsigned l ) : ChromosomeT< double >( l ) {}
00076   ChromosomeCMACholesky( unsigned l, const double& v ): ChromosomeT< double >( l, v ) {}
00077   ChromosomeCMACholesky( const std::vector< double >& v ) : ChromosomeT< double >( v ) {}
00078   ~ChromosomeCMACholesky( ) {}; 
00079 
00080   void init(unsigned             dimension, 
00081             std::vector<double > stdv, 
00082             double               initialSigma,
00083             ChromosomeT<double> &MinInit,
00084             ChromosomeT<double> &MaxInit,
00085             int                  noOffspring = 1)  {
00086     unsigned i;
00087    
00088     n     = dimension;
00089     sigma = initialSigma;
00090     
00091     (*this).resize(n);
00092     
00093     pc.resize    (n);
00094     
00095     B.resize     (n, n);
00096     
00097     z.resize     (n);
00098     
00099     initialize(MinInit, MaxInit);
00100 
00101     lambda = noOffspring;
00102     ccov    = 2. / (n*n+6.); 
00103     
00104 
00105     // succprob, p_succ 
00106     psPrime = 1./(5. + sqrt((double)lambda)/2.); 
00107     //psPrime = 1. / 2. * 1./(5. + (double)lambda/4.); 
00108     ps      = psPrime;
00109     
00110     cp = (psPrime * lambda) / (2 +  psPrime * lambda);
00111     
00112     d = 1 + n / (lambda * 2);
00113     
00114    
00115 
00116     // eigenvalues and eigenvector matrix B
00117     
00118     B = 0.;
00119 
00120     for(i = 0; i < n; i++) B(i, i) = stdv[i];
00121   }
00122 
00123   void init(unsigned dimension, 
00124             double   initialSigma,              
00125             double   MinInit,
00126             double   MaxInit,
00127             int      lambda=1) {
00128     std::vector<double> stdv(dimension);
00129     ChromosomeT<double> chromeMinInit(dimension), chromeMaxInit(dimension);
00130     
00131     for(i = 0; i < dimension; i++) {
00132       stdv         [i] = 1;
00133       chromeMinInit[i] = MinInit;
00134       chromeMaxInit[i] = MaxInit;
00135     }
00136     init(dimension, stdv, initialSigma, chromeMinInit, chromeMaxInit, lambda);
00137   }
00138 
00139   void init(unsigned dimension, 
00140             std::vector<double > &stdv, 
00141             double   initialSigma,              
00142             double   MinInit,
00143             double   MaxInit,
00144             int      lambda=1) {
00145     ChromosomeT<double> chromeMinInit(dimension), chromeMaxInit(dimension);
00146     
00147     for(i = 0; i < dimension; i++) {
00148       chromeMinInit[i] = MinInit;
00149       chromeMaxInit[i] = MaxInit;
00150     }
00151     init(dimension, stdv, initialSigma, chromeMinInit, chromeMaxInit, lambda);
00152   }
00153 
00154   void mutate() {
00155     // draw random vector
00156     for(i = 0; i < n; i++) z(i) = Rng::gauss(0,1);
00157     
00158     // mutate objective variables, Eq. (1)
00159     for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
00160       for(j = 0; j < n; j++) 
00161         (*this)[i] += sigma * B(i,j)  * z(j);
00162     
00163   };
00164 
00165   void updateGlobalStepsize(double nsucc) {
00166     // Step size update by accumulated success probability
00167     ps    = (1 - cp) * ps + cp *(nsucc/lambda);
00168     sigma *= exp( (ps - (psPrime/(1-psPrime))*(1-ps)) / d);
00169   };
00170

00213   const Array<double> &getB() { return B; }

00215   double getSigma() { return sigma; };
00216 
00217   double getCondition() { return 1; }
00218 
00219   double getPath() { return ps; };

00221 
00222 protected:
00223   void rankOneUpdate(Array<double> &A, const Array<double> &v, double alpha, double beta) {
00224       Array<double> H;
00225       double s, wNormSqr;
00226       wNormSqr = scalarProduct(v, v) * beta / alpha;
00227       s = -1/wNormSqr * (1-sqrt(1+wNormSqr));
00228       H = innerProduct(A, v);
00229       H = outerProduct(H, v);
00230       A = sqrt(alpha) * A + s * H * (beta / sqrt(alpha)); 
00231   }
00232 
00233   Chromosome* clone( ) const { return new ChromosomeCMACholesky( *this ); }
00234   Chromosome* empty( ) const { return new ChromosomeCMACholesky; }
00235 
00236 private:
00237   unsigned n;           // Dimension // problem dimension / chromosome length
00238   unsigned lambda;      //           // size of offspring population
00239   unsigned i, j, k;     //           // iterators
00240   double sigma;         // delta     // the current global stepsize
00241   double psPrime;       //           // target success probability; strategy constant for global stepsize update
00242   double ccov;          //           // strategy constant for cma update
00243   double d;
00244   double cp;
00245   double ps;            // avsuccess // global stepsize culmulation path 
00246   Array<double> pc;     // s         // evo cumulation path
00247   Array<double> B;      //           // decomposition of covariance matrix
00248   Array<double> z;      // standard normally distributed mutation vector
00249
